original_text: Sodom and her daughters will become as happy as they were before. Samaria and her daughters will become as happy as they were before. And you and your daughters will also become as happy as you were before.
korean_text: 네 아우 소돔과 그의 딸들이 옛 지위를 회복할 것이요 사마리아와 그의 딸들도 그의 옛 지위를 회복할 것이며 너와 네 딸들도 너희 옛 지위를 회복할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Sodom and her daughters will become as happy as they were before.
sentences.korean_translation: 소돔과 그녀의 딸들은 이전처럼 행복해질 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: Samaria and her daughters will become as happy as they were before.
sentences.korean_translation: 사마리아와 그녀의 딸들도 이전처럼 행복해질 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: will also become as happy as you were before.
